Title: Chennai Express
Writer: K. Subhash (story), Yunus Sajawal (screenplay), Robin Bhatt (additional screenplay), Farhad Samji (dialogue), Sajid (dialogue)
Actors: Deepika Padukone, Shah Rukh Khan, Sathyaraj, Nikitin Dheer
Plot: A man heading towards Rameshwaram via Chennai express to immerse his late grandfather's ashes unwillingly gets caught amidst goons after helping their boss's daughter and them board the train.
Production: Red Chillies Entertainment, UTV Motion Pictures
